title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 899.80 - Filing of financial reports-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 899.80 - Filing of financial reports-general

State Regulations

By not later than 90 days following the close of its fiscal
year, every cable television company, except a cable television company which
is one solely by reason of its ownership or control of another cable television
company, shall file an annual financial report with the commission as described
in sections
899.81
-899.83 of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
899.80

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
